cause.description:
On July 23, 2005, Daniel Roman, a brother of the Rho Alpha Chapter of Sigma Lambda Beta International Fraternity, Inc., passed away from a tragic car accident. The brothers of the Rho Alpha Chapter have started a scholarship fund in honor of his name. Once the scholarship is set, it will benefit Florida State, minority students.
1. Help young minorities reach their college goals
cause.mission: raise 25,000 to set up a scholarship through FSU
cause.name: Daniel Enrique Roman Scholarship Fund
